# Wealth

Coinage is indicated in units of sovereign pieces (sp). The wealth level of characters is determined by the value of their available assets (including strongholds).

## Wealth Levels

|#|Description|SP Increment|SP Min|
|---|---|---|---|
|1-5|Poor|100|0|
|6-19|Modest|1,000|500|
|20-39|Comfortable|10,000|14,500|
|40-59|Wealthy|100,000|194,500|
|60-99|Noble|250,000|2,094,500|
|100+|Sovereign|1,000,000|11,844,500|
